name: Seongkook Heo
content: Seongkook Heo Seongkook Heo I am the Alfred Weaver Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Virginia. I direct Ultimate User Interface Lab, where we develop sensing and haptic feedback technologies and build interactive systems. I was previously a postdoctoral researcher in the DGP lab at the University of Toronto, where I worked with Prof. Daniel Wigdor. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science at the KAIST in 2017, advised by Prof. Geehyuk Lee. I was also a research intern at industry research labs, including Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology, Microsoft Research (with Dr. Ken Hinckley), and Autodesk Research (with Dr. Tovi Grossman). seongkook@virginia.edu | Rice Hall 524 | CV | Google scholar
